mapper.select: select gno, gname, price, pics, tno from goodsinfo gf1 where 4 > (select count(gno) from goodsinfo gf2 where gf1.tno = gf2.tno and gf1.gno < gf2.gno) order by gf1.tno asc, gf1.gno desc
select gno, gname, price, unit, weight, pics from goodsinfo gf where tno=#{tno} order by (select count(gno) from orderItemInfo of where of.gno=gf.gno) desc, gno desc limit #{page}, #{rows}
select gno, gname, gf.tno, price, intro, balance, pics, unit, weight, qperied, descr, tname from goodsinfo gf, goodstype gt where gf.tno = gt.tno and gno = #{_parameter}
